name: Nature s Secrets Multivitamin Face Cream
description: Vitamins B, C and E in this beauty cream nourish the skin, while the unique combination of sandalwood, venivel and nut-grass reduces pigmentation and dark spots for a clearer skin. This mineral oil-free, non-greasy, natural oil formula with UV filters protects your skin from sun damage, leaving your face healthier and radiantly beautiful. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
